001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.wallet;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
004import org.bitcoinj.crypto.HDPath;
005import org.bitcoinj.crypto.ChildNumber;
006
007import static org.bitcoinj.base.ScriptType.P2PKH;
008import static org.bitcoinj.base.ScriptType.P2WPKH;
009
010/**
011 * Path builder that supports BIP44, BIP84, etc. This functionality will be in the next release of bitcoinj.
012 * This interface will be deprecated after the next release of bitcoinj.
013 * @deprecated Use {@link org.bitcoinj.wallet.KeyChainGroupStructure#BIP43} and constants in {@link org.bitcoinj.wallet.DeterministicKeyChain}
014 */
015@Deprecated
016public interface BipStandardKeyChainGroupStructure {
017    ChildNumber PURPOSE_BIP44 = ChildNumber.PURPOSE_BIP44;  // P2PKH
018    ChildNumber PURPOSE_BIP49 = ChildNumber.PURPOSE_BIP49;  // P2WPKH-nested-in-P2SH
019    ChildNumber PURPOSE_BIP84 = ChildNumber.PURPOSE_BIP84;  // P2WPKH
020
021    ChildNumber COINTYPE_BTC = ChildNumber.COINTYPE_BTC;
022    ChildNumber COINTYPE_TBTC = new ChildNumber(1, true);
023
024    ChildNumber CHANGE_RECEIVING = ChildNumber.ZERO;
025    ChildNumber CHANGE_CHANGE = ChildNumber.ONE;
026
027    HDPath BIP44_PARENT = HDPath.BIP44_PARENT;
028    HDPath BIP84_PARENT = HDPath.BIP84_PARENT;
029
030
031    /**
032     * Map desired output script type and account index to an account path
033     * @param outputScriptType output script type (purpose)
034     * @param netId network/coin type
035     * @return The HD Path: purpose / coinType / accountIndex
036     */
037    static HDPath pathFor(org.bitcoinj.base.ScriptType outputScriptType, String netId) {
038        return purpose(outputScriptType)
039                .extend(coinType(netId), account(0));
040    }
041
042    /**
043     * Return the (root) path containing "purpose" for the specified scriptType
044     * @param scriptType script/address type
045     * @return An HDPath with a BIP44 "purpose" entry
046     */
047    static HDPath purpose(org.bitcoinj.base.ScriptType scriptType) {
048        if (scriptType == null || scriptType == P2PKH) {
049            return BIP44_PARENT;
050        } else if (scriptType == P2WPKH) {
051            return BIP84_PARENT;
052        } else {
053            throw new IllegalArgumentException(scriptType.toString());
054        }
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * Return coin type path component for a network id
059     * @param networkId network id string, eg. {@link BitcoinNetwork#ID_MAINNET}
060     */
061    static ChildNumber coinType(String networkId) {
062        BitcoinNetwork network = BitcoinNetwork.fromIdString(networkId)
063                .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown network id (coin type)"));
064        switch (network) {
065            case MAINNET:
066                return COINTYPE_BTC;
067            case TESTNET:
068                return COINTYPE_TBTC;
069            case SIGNET:
070                return COINTYPE_TBTC;
071            case REGTEST:
072            default:
073                return COINTYPE_TBTC;
074        }
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * Return path component for an account
079     * @param accountIndex account index
080     * @return A hardened path component
081     */
082    static ChildNumber account(int accountIndex) {
083        return new ChildNumber(accountIndex, true);
084    }
085}
